ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the business number 2 field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(Business_Number__pc ) && NOT(ISNULL(Business_Number__pc)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Business_Number__pc)) && !REGEX(Business_Number__pc ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(Business_Number__pc)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Business_Number__pc )) && !REGEX(Business_Number__pc ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for business number 2 . The minimum number of digits should be 10
